solution_line_template: If Lauryn made ${lauryn_earnings} from eBay, then her friend made {aurelia_percentage}*${lauryn_earnings} = <<{aurelia_percentage}*{lauryn_earnings}={aurelia_earnings}>>{aurelia_earnings}
In total, the two friends made ${lauryn_earnings}+${aurelia_earnings} = $<<{lauryn_earnings}+{aurelia_earnings}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}
